ja508:10.1: pituhadayassa → hadayassa (bj), paddhagū → patthagū (s2, s3) | pattagū (mr)
ja508:12.3: Anipphannatā → anipphādāya (bj, pts1) | anipphannatāya (s2, s3) | ānipphādā (?)
ja508:13.2: Dvipadajaninda → dipadinda (bj, s2, s3, pts1), metaṃ → netaṃ (bj, pts1) | te taṃ (s2, s3)
ja508:14.1: Paṇhe → pañño (bj, pts1) | pañhe (s2, s3) | panhe (mr)
ja508:20.3: Devindassa gataṃ tadajja hatthaṃ → devindassa tadajja hatthagataṃ (mr)
